title: Navaratna Kundan Tops - Auspicious Gemstone Earrings
materials: Cat's Eye Chrysoberyl (Vaiduryam) and Other Navratna Stones(14.88 ct).
features: Classic circular design featuring a central oval-cut Emerald surrounded by a halo of dazzling diamonds. An Outer ring of Navratna Gemstones set in a Kundan style setting. Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures a refined, high-quality finish.
colors: and various complementary hues from the Navratna gemstones. The harmonious blending of these colors adds to the piece's auspiciousness.
occasions: or as a valuable addition to your heirloom jewelry collection.
description: This pair of earrings represents traditional Indian artistry, combining the best of Kundan craftsmanship with the brilliance of diamonds and the auspicious power of Navratna. It's not just a piece of jewelry, but a symbol of prosperity and good fortune. Perfect for those who appreciate timeless elegance and cultural heritage.
